metadata.title: CVE-2018-17972 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in the proc_pid_stack function in fs/proc/base.c inthe Linux kernel through 4.18.11. It does not ensure that only root mayinspect the kernel stack of an arbitrary task, allowing a local attacker toexploit racy stack unwinding and leak kernel task stack contents.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17972` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic - 6.8.0-31.31
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-31-generic-64k - 6.8.0-31.31
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1008-aws - 6.8.0-1008.8
No subscription required

No subscription required
